Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件的数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于事件为提供的值事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。The class is used to supply event values to the event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 你可以访问事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 构造对象使用当前和将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果未指定的值期间属性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名标识时，才引发事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性设置为在一个自定义值的匿名标识符**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。You can use the property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 如果未指定的值期间属性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名标识时，才引发事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
